website_summaries.verdict: Game of Thrones glammed up with a strappy heel.
pros: Expensive-looking chic sandal comes in a variety of colors

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: These shoes get tons of compliments. I've worn them all day walking around town and my feet still feel fine. My only star deduction is because like most Steve Madden shoes, where the buckle is on the side rubs my ankle raw from some sort of rough material. I've tried loosening the strap and it still rubs.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love this heel. They are so comfy!!!! The color is a little off but I must keep. Could have went up a size but 7.5 will do. I was torn between the two
customer_reviews.author: Krysteina

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, sexy but not the standard cage style. These are well made. Good foot support, no hanging pinky or unnecessary pressure on the upper feet. I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lady GG

customer_reviews.title: but very pretty looks lovely on and very comfy too
customer_reviews.text: these are lovely but runs really small so i'm a size 9 and i bought 9.5 thank God i tried in the store before i ordered as this color was not available at the store where i went shopping..but very pretty looks lovely on and very comfy too..you can wear with jeans casual wear or dress it up a bit for more sophisticated look.. i may buy another colour if i get a good sale price
customer_reviews.author: jully

customer_reviews.title: show off yo shoes girl
customer_reviews.text: Love this style, very sexy, runs a 1/2 size small haven't worn them yet except around the house seems to be comfortable if your foot is narrow to medium. I highly recommend, I'm going to buy another pair in a different color
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Sexy
customer_reviews.text: I am a seven but purchased a seven and a half based on reviews. They fit perfect. I was surprised that the straps are somewhat firm probably by design to preserve form. I have kind of wide feet and a bunion - but these are completely comfortable without digging into the imperfections (if you are comfortable with the the four inch heel). The stiletto heel is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Im giving the shoes a 4 star because the shoes didn't fit 100%. I am a size 11 and I ordered a size 11, that was the biggest they have. Even though it fit but maybe about half an inch was still out of the shoes. But it's not noticeable (I think) and they are comfortable. So I'm ok with. But it's beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: beautiful! It is perfect, I love it, I arrive on the indicated date and they are simply the best. totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Imah lopez

customer_reviews.title: And comfortable enough to walk around and stay standing up for ...
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE GORGEOUS!!! And comfortable enough to walk around and stay standing up for a while! Love them! They make a statement even though the color doesn't make you think/expect so! <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steve Madden Slithur
customer_reviews.text: My wife had her bridesmaids wear these heels in our April 2017 wedding and they looked fantastic. She swears by Steve Madden, particularly this style because it's comfortable and looks nice. This style also always fits as expected (at least in our experiences)!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Tate

customer_reviews.title: I usually wear a 8/5 but i ordered an 9 instead which was a great fit. I ordered these for my prom which ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast . I got these shoes today .. 20 minutes ago to be exact. I usually wear a 8/5 but i ordered an 9 instead which was a great fit. I ordered these for my prom which is next month. I love em they are easy to walk in and i got them on sale for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: miesha

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: i have wide feet & these fit great. As always with Steve Madden they run small on me so I ordered a size up. I'm usually a 9 but ordered a 10. Fit perfect nothinh hanging out the front or back of the shoe. I just ordered the black pair!
customer_reviews.author: Ee

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoe, but I would recommend to purchase a 1/2 size o 1 size up. Not a shoe for wide feet. I ordered a size 7 1/2, when I usually wear a size 7, and I still feel a size 8 would have been better. Maybe because my feet aren't too thin...probably for thin feet, purchase 1/2 size up.
customer_reviews.author: Paola V.

customer_reviews.title: It fit as expected as looks beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: It fit as expected as looks beautiful!!!!!!! Unfortunately, it made me want to cut my feet off after twenty minutes. I would rather my shoes to last at least 30, especially if I'm sitting the majority of the time.
customer_reviews.author: SR-Reviews

customer_reviews.title: I love this shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe, so colorful, I have not yet worn it except trying it on with different clothing. It picks up orange really good and I can't wait to wear them with my spring/summer orange dresses. By the way, this shoe is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Prettyboot

customer_reviews.title: Sexy, elegant and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals. I compared them to the sandals from Nordstrom and found no difference, except for the lower price. The arch support is great, but the heel is a little high, but they are still very sexy and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Nona

customer_reviews.title: So stylish and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely adore these shoes!! I get compliments on them every time I wear them. I have pretty wide feet and these don’t bother me by the end of the day, so I feel like that says a lot. I don’t normally wear heels because of the discomfort but these I can go all day and don’t have to worry about bringing flipflops or other shoes for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykohhhl

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, small shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe came with open Original Werthers candy inside. I wear a 9.5 but I ordered the 10 to be safe. My heel hung off the back and they were super narrow. The material was decent though. I’m disappointed but hey, they were cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Loving my light blue strappy sandals :-)
customer_reviews.text: This shoe gives a sleek sophisticated look. BINGO! (Even though it was delivered a day late) Pissed about the late delivery, but happy about the item. Love my light blue strappy sandals :-)
customer_reviews.author: Chilli

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, these are awesome !!! First of all they are extremely comfortable, but they do run a bit small, i would suggest going half a size up. They look very classy and can be dressed up or casually !
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Hello Mello Yellow!!!
customer_reviews.text: This AWESOME, very sexy on!!! It can be dressed up or down and if you do not have that mustard yellow sandal for the summer. This is definitely it, I am going to order the Sky Blue next.
customer_reviews.author: ShaJuana Perdue

customer_reviews.title: Love !!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes !! They are so easy to walk in because the front part kind of stablizes you ankle as you walk. I got a size 8 and just based it off the other Steve Madden shoes I have. They fit perfect. I ordered in the nude color, and am extremly happy with my purchase! Would defiantly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Sara S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfy to wear out. I wore them to a bar and date night and have no issues. I get many compliments when I wear them and the color is amazing and pops.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Samei

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoes! I got a lot of compliments and ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes! I got a lot of compliments and they are relatively comfortable given the heel height! Would totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mani S.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy. I’m 8 months pregnant and wore these ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. I’m 8 months pregnant and wore these to my hubby’s bday party. I was surprised with the comfort level. Definitely a must have. I’m an 8 but bought and 8.5. Size up.
customer_reviews.author: Chaskele

customer_reviews.title: Fits me like a glove but like most heels hurts after a ...
customer_reviews.text: luv them, def for skinny feet. Fits me like a glove but like most heels hurts after a few hrs walking in them. Hope they dont strech.
customer_reviews.author: pole

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes! I have worn theses shoes almost every day since I got them. They are comfortable and sexy! Love!
customer_reviews.author: jwalker2013

customer_reviews.title: This shoes are nice, not as beautiful or well-made as the original ...
customer_reviews.text: This shoes are nice, not as beautiful or well-made as the original Schutz Julianas but I guess you get what you pay for :-) I am a true size 11 but these ran a tad small.
customer_reviews.author: Ani.m

customer_reviews.title: They're also quite comfortable. I have a wide foot so was expecting ...
customer_reviews.text: Really cute shoes. They're also quite comfortable. I have a wide foot so was expecting that I may have to return them but they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get compliments all the time have them in 3 colors
customer_reviews.author: debbie rogers

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The slope is steeper than I thought, but over ok.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Rosello

customer_reviews.title: Item not as described
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality, looked nothing like an authentic Steve Madden sandal, i had to return it! Too many defective spots. It was so disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Edita Isagolian

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful heels but they are plastic material so one of the shoe band broke when I was at a weeding:(
customer_reviews.author: Nachelly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes. I wear a 10 no matter what
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes. I wear a 10 no matter what....but.... my heel hung over half and inch. That hurt. They were gorgeous but to late to order a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too big!
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews from other customers, i bought a half size bigger! I was totally disappointed as they were loose on my feet and flopped as i walked. I should have bought 7.5 (my actual size) and NOT a size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shioes my feet did not hurt and the heel height was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are so comfortable and look good dressed up or with just a pair of cropped pants. I also bought them in black.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie James

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe- very comfortable for how high the heel is. Very flattering on the foot.
customer_reviews.author: omg.shoes

customer_reviews.title: Blue is my color
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great and look good on. Get compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ash

customer_reviews.title: more like a dark blue gray
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous shoe, but the color is not light blue, more like a dark blue gray. Not sure if I'm keeping it since it doesn't match my dress.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received shoe in good condition. The heel is very comfortable,shoe is also very classy and sexy.
customer_reviews.author: keke5

customer_reviews.title: Super sexy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! They are sexy and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I'm a 6.5 and ordered 3 pairs in different colors of these shoes (black nubuck, blush nubuck and white leather). They are my favorite sandal...can be worn with a dress or cropped pants. Wish the blue didn't sell out in my size!
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwins71

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Not too uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Not too uncomfortable, but I'm ok with a bit of pain in the name of fashion!

customer_reviews.title: ... them on i know they are going to be comfortable and i love the
customer_reviews.text: i just recieved mine today and just trying them on i know they are going to be comfortable and i love the quality

customer_reviews.title: cute but size up a 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really like this shoe in white, but the style is sexy, sent this pair back and bought a different color
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Other than that its a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is cute.. however, for my ladies with wide feet (like myself) I wish they had these in wide! Other than that its a nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sexy & Sophisticated ;)
customer_reviews.text: Sophisticated and Sexy!!! Very flattering sandals. Typically, I read reviews (regarding shoe buying) and determine the size I'm going to purchase. My feet are short and wide, therefore, I can wear size 7 1/2 - 8 1/2. It really depends on the designer and how the shoe is constructed. In this particular shoe, I purchased a size 8 and it fit perfectly. I walked around the house, wearing them for a while and they stretched a bit, which was great. They are quite comfortable and look fabulous. I am going to buy the Cobalt blue and the gold shoes, for sure! Want the red ones, but, haven't made up my mind yet. These really are BEAUTIFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Glad I read the reviews to go 1/2 size up. This is a beautiful and comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are the most beautiful & universal high heels I got! I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Edyta Jaczynska

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, but I will be returning
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe, but I will be returning. I have narrow feet and the width is too wide for me, so my heel is loose when trying to walk in the shoe. Unfortunate fit because it's gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A lot more comfortable than they look! Super flattering too!
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Able solution love the shoes. Buying the black and light blue next for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fashionable and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandal! Easy to dress up or down and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I got a size 10 but am usually a size ...
customer_reviews.text: I got a size 10 but am usually a size 9.5 in Steve Madden. Wish I would have gotten the 9.5 but still lovely shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe, good stability for a high heel
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoe! Just as pictured. As comfortable as you'd expect for a heel this high, so I wouldn't call them slipper comfortable... with that said, there were no pinch points, and the shoe provides good stability in that the caged design will hold your foot in place. I would choose these for a night of dancing, no question.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it good material, a little bit small go half size up
customer_reviews.author: Josianne KUITE

customer_reviews.title: Love these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes they are the perfect heel for wearing out as they do not have a back and will not hurt your heel. I get many compliments on these!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like Steve Madden, the sandal fit just like the other pair I had, comfortable and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Wham

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute and comfy! I love them so much I think I'm going to have to get a black pair! :)
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: wife said these are the most comfortable heels she's worn in a long time
customer_reviews.author: 38kb73

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this shoe. Perfect nude color.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! Love these and get a lot of comments on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are super cute heels
customer_reviews.text: They are super cute heels. They run a bit small so I encourage you ladies to go half a size up. Although the seem authentic, they are super uncomfortable. For the price, I would have just boughten another brand of this style. Too expansive & not even comfortable heels.
customer_reviews.author: Rely

customer_reviews.title: Super sexy and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes! They are sexy and comfortable to wear for long periods of time. I'm a 6.5 and ordered 3 pairs in different colors of these shoes (black nubuck, blush nubuck and white leather). They are my favorite sandal...can be worn with a dress or cropped pants. Wish the blue didn't sell out in my size!
customer_reviews.author: Momoftwins71

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful but it runs a little small I'm usually a ...
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful but it runs a little small I'm usually a 7 but 7 was too small I had to order a 7 1/2
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Steve Madden Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have not worn the shoes all day so I can't answer that question. Since they are sandals, they don't have too much arch support. But, the shoes are so sharp! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: bdab

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Cutest shoes! Extremely happy with the fit and the look! Looks exactly like the image. I would highly recommend purchasing these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: Knock off brand
customer_reviews.text: These do not appear to be authentic Steve Maddens! I purchased this pair online because my local store did not have my size. When I received the shoe, they fit completely different from the ones in store. I ended up purchasing a pair directly from Steve Madden, and when compared side by side, the shoes were COMPLETELY different. The most obvious difference being the quality of the shoe. The materials, stitching, labels, structure, fit, packaging, and padding are all obviously different when compared side by side.The shoes are not even made in the same country. I would recommend purchasing shoes directly from the source, because the differences were too vast for me to ignore.
customer_reviews.author: dwf

customer_reviews.title: Lovely shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable if you are used to wearing heels and have a high arch. I love these!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Regis

customer_reviews.title: Theyre beautiful, but a littlebit uncofortable
customer_reviews.text: Theyre beautiful, but a littlebit uncomfortable, because they fit so small. Usually, I'm a 7 and a half or an 8, but these ones fit somewhat small. Even though, I like them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely satisfied with these shoes. They were purchased in such short notice but they still got here right on time for my 21st Birthday celebration. The photos post by others helped me to make my decision on buying them and I don't regret it. I have a wide, flat foot and they fit and look fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: courtney cadle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, comfortable shoe! Great price compared to $110 at a local boutique. I took the advice of some reviews and sized up a half size and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Donald L Ingold jr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lovely shoes haven't worn them yet but I'm still happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Steve Madden Women's Slithur Dress Sandal
product_meta.description:
Open toe stiletto heel caged dress sandal

What began as a modest $1100 investment in 1990 has developed into one of the most iconic brands in footwear. From a factory in Queens, NY, Steve Madden has revolutionized the shoe industry, merging years of experience with unique and creative designs. Inspired by rock and roll and his New York roots, his vision to provide on-trend women and men with an outlet to express their individuality is innovative, daring, and inspiring. Steve’s innate understanding of trends and unparalleled willpower have resulted in millions of customers worldwide and propelled his designs to the forefront of fashion. He has expanded the Steve Madden brand into a true lifestyle and destination for footwear, handbags and accessories, sold in over 80 countries worldwide. It’s about authenticity. It’s about embracing individuality. It’s Steve Madden.
feature_bullets: Leather dress sandal featuring covered heel and geometric cutouts at upper
